Record.ClassificationPath: Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Skin Diseases, Infectious/Skin Diseases, Viral/Erythema Infectiosum
Virus Diseases/DNA Virus Infections/Parvoviridae Infections/Erythema Infectiosum
Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Erythema/Erythema Infectiosum
Record.Description: Contagious infection with human B19 Parvovirus most commonly seen in school age children and characterized by fever, headache, and rashes of the face, trunk, and extremities. It is often confused with rubella.
